column4: so can anyone help me with my problem im stuck in irssi and my ati card is not working right as per the howto

no can anyone actually help me with my ati card please?
I wish I could help but I donT' knwo anythinga bout ati cards,  ask periodicaly maybe someone who knows will show up and be able to answer your questiion,
thank you as well....ill give it a try and hopefully be back for some proper help thank you guys so much ^_^
thanx man ill need it.... hehe
one last thing that command you gave to me sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf~ what does the ~ do? it dosen't seem to work O_o am i doing it wrong?
well it assumes that you edited xorg.conf with  gedit or someting  and ~ is not a switch it is appended to the files by the editor to make a backup
mmm i did what the howto said....imma try to look for the actual filename and see what is what....ill be back in a second or so...i hope hehe
found it and replaced it...imma try it now to see if it works....see you in GUI land hopefully XD
it worked ok can ya help me get my ati card working right...or Patrick_ maybe?
I don'T know anything about ati cards , sorry
